article.title: General Atomics Aeronautical System Receives U.S. Army Contract for Logistics Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical System has been awarded a $10,487,251 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for logistics support for the I-GNAT/Sky Warrior alpha unmanned aircraft system. The U.S. Army Aviation and Missile Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
